clientsPets.title: Import Clients & Pets
clientsPets.description: Download the template, fill in client and pet data, then upload the file to import

steps.step1Desc: Download the ready-made Excel file with required columns and an example row
steps.step2Desc: Enter client and pet data starting from row 3 (ignore the example row)
steps.step3Desc: Upload the filled file and review data in the preview table before importing

clientsPets.templateNote: Required columns: First Name, Last Name, Phone, Pet Name, Species, Gender

uploadSection.title: Upload Data File
uploadSection.dragDrop: Drag and drop your file here

results.title: Import Results
results.summary: Imported {{imported}} new clients, added {{petAdded}} pets to existing clients, {{errors}} failed

errors.genderInvalid: Gender must be MALE or FEMALE
errors.birthDateInvalid: Invalid birth date format, must be YYYY-MM-DD
errors.birthDateFuture: Birth date cannot be in the future
errors.weightInvalid: Weight must be a positive number
errors.parseError: Error reading file. Please check the file format
errors.tooManyRows: Row count exceeds maximum limit (5000 rows)

clientsPets.speciesNote: Supported species: DOG, CAT, BIRD, RABBIT, HAMSTER, GUINEA_PIG, TURTLE, FISH, HORSE, GOAT, SHEEP, COW, CAMEL, DONKEY, MONKEY, FERRET, HEDGEHOG, SNAKE, LIZARD, FROG, CHICKEN, DUCK, PIG, ALPACA, OTHER
